update TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select SUM(IN_TRANS_AMT) from TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL where PROFIT_DATE = #{profitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SOURCE_INFO = 'MPOS'
